slides.title: What is a Variable?
slides.body: A variable is a symbol (like x) that represents a number. We can solve for it using equations.

slides.title: Like Terms
slides.body: Like terms have the same variable and exponent. Example: 2x and 5x are like terms; 2x and 2y are not.

slides.title: Solving 1-Step Equations
slides.body: Undo the operation: if x + 4 = 9, then x = 9 - 4 = 5.
